name: KIT109 - Exam Game
description:
Choose a difficulty from the menu

Click the buttons to move the box

Each button indicates which way the box moves

i.e Left for left, Right for right, Up for jump and the stop for stop

Reach the black hole to advance

Use the top number keys or the Numpad keys from 1 through to 0 to change between levels

1. Default

2. Deadly Walls

3. Bouncy Platform

4. Moving Deadly Walls

5. Invisible World

6. Moon

7. Scrolling and Buttons

8. Chasing Enemies

9.  Bouncy Platforms and Deadly Platforms

10. Upside Down

Press Esc to return to the menu

Press R to reload the level (without the cost of any lives -- this is for debugging).

Features

All Core Functionality

Includes all extra functionality except for the avatar animation

Features a title screen with all difficulties except normal (Normal difficulty does not work)

In-Game UI

No Start or end of level text or Post-processing and time scale

Levels

1. Functionality

2. Functionality

3. Functionality

4. Moving death wall and Correctly resetting

5. Features Invisible objects but no indication of where they are

6. Moon gravity

7. Button and Cinemachine

8. Enemies and the enemies rotate towards the player and explode on impact with the player

9. Playability, uniqueness, functionality

10. Playability, uniqueness, functionality
